section.subtitle: What I Offer
section.title: Services
section.description: Specialized services to bring your digital ideas to life with cutting-edge technology and creative solutions.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Building modern, responsive websites and web applications using the latest technologies and best practices.

services.title: Full Stack Development
services.description: End-to-end development from database design to frontend implementation with seamless API integration.

services.title: 3D Web Experiences
services.description: Creating immersive 3D experiences and animations using Three.js, WebGL, and GSAP for engaging user interactions.

services.title: UI/UX Development
services.description: Translating designs into pixel-perfect, interactive interfaces with smooth animations and transitions.

services.title: API Development
services.description: Designing and building RESTful and GraphQL APIs with proper authentication, validation, and documentation.

services.title: Performance Optimization
services.description: Optimizing web applications for speed, SEO, and accessibility to deliver the best user experience.

cta.title: Ready to Start a Project?
cta.description: Let's collaborate and create something extraordinary together.
